== Pirayiri (CT) (627653) ==

Pirayiri (CT) is a town in the [[Palakkad]] taluka of [[Palakkad]] district with an area of 18.69 sq. km. and harbouring 8944 households with total population of 41359 as per the 2011 Census. The district headquarter [[Palakkad]] is at a distance of 5 km. The state headquarter [[Thiruvananthapuram]] is at a distance of 380 km. Male population is 20265 and female population is 21094. Scheduled Caste population is 4216 and Scheduled Tribes population is 42. Census Location Code of the town is 627653<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.

Population wise class of the town is Class III (population_total 20,000 to 49,999).
The civic status of the town is 'Census Town'.

The nearest city with population more than 1 lakh is Palakkad (m) at a distance of 5 km. The nearest city with population more than 5 lakh is Coimbatore(m corp. )  at a distance of 68 km. Railway station is at Palakkad at a distance of 5 km.
